QuestData.Title: Mizik the Haughty
QuestData.Description:
Bad spriggans! Bad! They take our anima. We lose our forms! And one is worst of all.
Mizik! He tells the others what to do. And he rides a gorm! Big, nasty gorm!
Get him. Get him!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This spriggan thinks he knows best. He receives his orders directly from the Ancient One.
QuestData.RewardText:
Gone! The bad spriggan is gone! Spirit Glen will be ours again.
Now to leave. We have to leave.
